text:
We have weekly worship services on Saturdays and Sundays, where we gather to praise and worship God in songs, to pray, to participate in the Lord’s Supper (for baptized Christians) and to listen to and learn from God’s Word being preached.

Saturday Service: 5.00pm - 6.30pm at Capernaum Room (level 3)

Sunday Service: 10.45am - 12.15pm at Sanctuary (level 2)

The huge banners hanging outside the church are always inspirational and super encouraging... And so I visited this place one day - so glad I did!!

Other than my P-precious SG Page 16, these other Ps really helped:

How I knew YCKC is THE ONE.
• Praise & worship
• Preaching
• Pastor and People
• Pews

Attended church service here and the people were really warm and nice without being overly friendly or intrusive, which is something I appreciate when attending church. Really enjoyed the service here.
People here are very warm. Teaching is Word based. Events are God centred. God is definitely present and real to me and many others!!
An authentic and supportive community. People here are warm and welcoming. Sound doctrine teaching based on the Word of God.  Jesus Christ is the centre of this church.
